subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets ground their way through four quarters and overtime to defeat the Knicks at Barclays Center in the teams’ first meeting. The intracity rivals are now tied for first place in their division.
snippet: The Nets ground their way through four quarters and overtime to defeat the Knicks at Barclays Center in the teams’ first meeting. The intracity rivals are now tied for first place in their division.
